microsummaries.staticTitle: shows when no summaries are available
microsummaries.title: name of microsummary
microsummaries.loadInSidebar: true if bkm should load in side bar
microsummaries.keyword: alias to activate the bkm from the location bar
microsummaries.predecessorid: GUID of previous item, or (empty if 1st item)

queries.folderName: name of the folder/tag to link to
queries.queryId: identifier of the smart bookmark query
queries.title: name of the query
queries.loadInSidebar: true if the bookmark should load in the sidebar
queries.keyword: alias to activate the bookmark from the location bar
queries.predecessorid: GUID of the item before this (empty if it’s first)

folders.title: name of folder
folders.predecessorid: GUID of the item before this (empty if it’s first)

separators.predecessorid: GUID of the item before this (empty if it’s first)
